text: Dustin Neil Diamond (January 7, 1977 - February 1, 2021) was an American actor, director, comedian, and musician. He was best known for his role as Samuel "Screech" Powers in Saved by the Bell. Diamond was born in San Jose, California. On December 26, 2014, Diamond was arrested in Ozaukee County, Wisconsin for stabbing a man at a bar. On May 29, 2015, Diamond was convicted of two misdemeanors and was sentenced to four months in prison. He served three months and was released on probation. In January 2021, Diamond was diagnosed with stage-4 small-cell lung carcinoma. He died from the disease while undergoing chemotherapy in Cape Coral, Florida on February 1, 2021 at the age of 44. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1977 births Category:2021 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Comedians from California Category:Movie directors from California Category:Musicians from California Category:Actors from San Jose, California Category:Criminals from California Category:Deaths from lung cancer Category:Cancer deaths in Florida
title: Dustin Diamond
